title: 1984 Ferrari 512 BBi at No Reserve
description: This 1984 Ferrari 512 BBi is one of 1,007 fuel-injected examples produced during a four-year production run. Finished in Rosso Corsa with Nero lower body panels over Nero leather upholstery, the car is powered by a 4.9-liter F110A flat-12 paired with a five-speed manual transaxle. Equipment includes a limited-slip differential, fog lights, center-lock metric five-spoke wheels, a Pioneer cassette radio and graphic equalizer, air conditioning, and a gated shifter. The clutch, timing belts, and fuel pumps were replaced in 2020 and the car was sold on BaT in September 2023. Recently acquired by the selling dealer, this 512 BBi shows 21k kilometers (~13k miles) and is offered at no reserve in California with a clean Carfax report and a clean Washington title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a No Reserve: 1984 Ferrari 512 BBi at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #194,678.
